description:
Summary: "python setup.py install" in bexar produces an incomplete setup

current run of python setup.py install does not install following:
- CA directory
- tools directory
- nova-api.conf file is installed in /etc instead of /etc/nova
title: 'python setup.py install' actually does not install a lot stuff from tarball

comments.content:
